posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Alright Oscar, based on the little you have told me,

One of the most successful characters and relatively easy to level is a (FTR/ BARD/ RDD), very solid warrior with huge strength, lots of combat feats, several immunities and high AC. If the server supports Devastating Critical then you can have that too with a powerful DC for it, as well. There are simply no downsides with this build, except if you count the ugly wings on your back (especially if you are a Dwarf, ugh). A fine companion for that character (and for any melee toon as well), would be a Sorcerer or an Arcane Archer that "shoots" spells or arrows with deadly precision behind him and in the case of Sorcerer, buff him/her as well. A Cleric would be fine too.

Another possibility and if you want something more "classic" would be a Dwarven Defender coupled with one of the above "support" classes. If your server has several tough traps & locks then you might consider a Rogue/ Fighter/ Shadowdancer as well for support with UMD to cover any missing buffs if scrolls available.
